database.name: VIEW OBPOS_PRODUCTVIEW
database.view: SELECT p.m_product_id, p.ad_client_id, p.ad_org_id, p.isactive, p.created, p.createdby, p.updated, p.updatedby, p.value, p.name, p.upc, p.c_uom_id, p.c_taxcategory_id, p.m_attributeset_id, p.m_product_category_id, p.em_obpos_catalog, p.em_obpos_line, p.em_obpos_productaux_id, p.em_obpos_scale, p.em_obpos_attributes, pp.m_pricelist_version_id, pp.pricelist, img.binarydata FROM m_productprice pp, m_product p LEFT JOIN ad_image img ON img.ad_image_id = p.ad_image_id WHERE p.m_product_id = pp.m_product_id
